dsense.name: as long as, so long as

example.eg: I am happy, as long as the sun always comes back around.
example.egtrans: 只要太阳还会升起，我就很开心。

dsense.name: as long as, so long as

example.eg: As long as you're living under my roof, you'll obey my rules, young lady!
example.egtrans: 小姐，在你住在我家的这段期间，你就得遵守我的规则！

example.eg: My garden is as long as a football pitch.
example.egtrans: 我的花园与一块足球场一样长。
